description: This route descends from the summit of Cannon Mountain to the Lafayette campsite via the Lonesome Lake Hut before returning to the base of Cannon Mountain by the Franconia Notch Bike Path.The Descent from the Summit follows the Kinsman Ridge Trail to the saddle at which point you drop to the Lonesome Lake . From here you can descend by the Appalachian Trail to the valley floor.
directions: Park at the base of Cannon Mountain and take the cable car to the summit.
title: Canon Mountain Descent
